# contentSize

**Instance Property**

The size of the content view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var contentSize: CGSize { get set }
```

## Discussion

The unit of size is points. The default size is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGSizeZero].

## Managing the content size and offset

- **contentOffset**: The point at which the origin of the content view is offset from the origin of the scroll view.
- **setContentOffset(_:animated:)**: Sets the offset from the content view’s origin that corresponds to the scroll view’s origin.
